meanings.definition: A type of compound consisting of three phenyl groups attached to a central carbon atom.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying the properties of triphenylmethanes in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The students learned about triphenylmethanes in their chemistry class.
meanings.sent3: The triphenylmethanes decided to have a party in the test tube.
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry was as strong as the bonds in triphenylmethanes.
meanings.sent5: The colorful triphenylmethanes sparkled under the microscope.
